thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com
thread.title: Seth Holden
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Seth Holden

author: Seth Holden
title: Seth Holden
text: I would like to thank Clint at the Townfair tire in Williston Vt I had a great experience buying rims and tires for my truck. Clint was very helpful and treated my wife and I like family. He went above and beyond for us. After I had locked the truck to drop it off to get the rims and tires put on I had locked my phone in the truck. He was able to get the phone to me with in the hour. Very impressed with the service and love the rims and tires. Very clean store and the price you can't beat. Thank u so very much again
